short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for the Fly-swatting-contest

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you can increase your swatted flies with ease.

To use this extension you need to enter the ip address and port number of the flies api you are using. This api can be found at https://github.com/wim07101993/flies.api. Without the api, the extension cannot be used.
